name: The Last One Standing (CJ GARNETT)
description:
Weekly Game Jam - Week 149 - Theme: 'Last One Left'

Play as the last human remaining on earth! Survive for as long as you can as the zombie hordes get more and more relentless!

Controls:

wasd -> Move

Left Mouse Button -> Shoot

Right Mouse Button -> Scope

Middle Mouse Button -> Grab

Space -> Jump

Arrow Keys -> Toggle book

Q -> Drop weapon

F -> Pick up weapon

Game developed in 5 days. This is the first ever game jam that I have participated in. I'm open to any type of feedback! 

~ Thank you for playing my game! :)
